name: LawsLoop
tag_list: write-own-manifesto, create-political-platform, politics, social-networking, manifesto, political-issues, ideology, society, democracy, free-speech, unions, freedom, liberal, conservative, communism, socialism, political-activism
overview:
LawsLoop is a political social networking website that allows registered users to create their own political manifesto.

LawsLoop does not exercise any kind of censorship over its members and all viewpoints, no matter how extreme, are welcomed.

Every page of a manifesto can be posted on by users and also rated on the political scale. Users are also able to use tools on the site that allow them to see what individuals of demographics feel about various issues. For example, any user is able to see what 20-30 year old males in the US feel about an issue like Abortion.

LawsLoop also has a continuing project to write copies of every (English language, for now) manifesto of every political party in the world.

Registration is free and people can create manifestos within minutes of joining.

LawsLoop also offers all the features you’d expect from a social networking site such as profiles, forums, messaging and the ability to post just about anywhere. It also allows users to create Unions and participate in Elections.
